heroTitle: Expertise in the supply of bitumen and asphalt
heroDescription: BitumAsphalt is an international trading company specializing in the supply and distribution of bitumen and petroleum derivatives for the construction, infrastructure, and land restoration industries. BitumAsphalt, a reliable supplier of bitumen and petroleum derivatives for construction and land restoration projects.
aboutUsDescription: BitumAsphalt is a trading group specializing in the supply and production of high-quality bitumen and asphalt for construction and infrastructure projects. With a focus on quality, innovation, creativity, and sustainability, and leveraging an extensive supply network, we deliver solutions aligned with modern infrastructure needs and environmental standards.
ourVisionDescription: To become a leading trading company in the supply and export of bitumen and asphalt in North American markets and globally. By relying on innovation, creativity, transparency, sustainability, and quality, we provide high-performance solutions that meet the challenges of modern infrastructure in harmony with sustainable environmental development.
ourMissionDescription: Expanding market share across the value chain by increasing efficiency, intelligence, and innovation in supply, production, trade, and sales. We focus on sustainable growth to not only meet global customer needs but also raise industry standards. Our commitment is to supply innovative materials that support land restoration and ecosystem improvement.
ourValuesInnovationDescription: Pioneering the development of innovative and efficient bitumen-based products.
ourValuesSustainabilityDescription: Promoting environmentally friendly practices and responsible trade.
ourValuesExcellenceDescription: Guaranteeing superior quality and outstanding service.
ourValuesIntegrityDescription: Building sustainable, trust-based partnerships with customers and suppliers.
ourProductsDescription: We offer a wide range of high-quality bitumen products, designed to meet the needs of the Canadian market and international customers.
